replies.body: You can appeal for an unban
replies.body_tagged: You can appeal for an unban

replies.body:
Please stay on topic. :}

You don't need permission to make map, anyone can do it. Also, you don't apply for map dev. If you frequently make maps and create YML's, you'll be handpicked.
replies.body_tagged:
Please stay on topic. :}

You don't need permission to make map, anyone can do it. Also, you don't apply for map dev. If you frequently make maps and create YML's, you'll be handpicked.

replies.body: Why did you make another topic? Stick to the one you already made I don't see a point for this.
replies.body_tagged: Why did you make another topic? Stick to the one you already made I don't see a point for this.

replies.body:
As it's been previously mentioned, you have to appeal for an unban (which you can do in the Appeal an Infraction sub-category under Policy, however I do not guarantee 100% success at becoming unbanned) and as PokerFace said, you don't require permission from anybody to create maps and/or submit them. Moreover, it doesn't matter whether you're banned or not, however, map making won't alter your chances of being unbanned whatsoever. If you wish to make a map with someone, I advise you use Skype to contact others just to avoid spamming the forums.

Question has been answered, thread is going off-topic, so...

Locking.

Moreover, it doesn't matter whether you're banned or not, however, map making won't alter your chances of being unbanned whatsoever. If you wish to make a map with someone, I advise you use Skype to contact others just to avoid spamming the forums.
